name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab To Do - Manage your browser tabs as to-do's.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move faster with more focus, by reducing clutter and speeding up your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Consolidate open tabs into a to-do list, inside your browser.
- Speed up Chrome by closing tabs.
- Improve focus and boost productivity.
- Never forget what you were supposed to do with that open tab, again!
